name: Retro Racer (Soul Grinder)
description:
A retro racing style game created for a game jam that required me to use a 256x192 resolution and these 14 colours , which is what the 1984 Sega SG-1000 system had.

>> Controls <<

Left and Right Arrow Keys to Steer,

Up  Arrow Key to Accelerate

Space to use Brakes
